mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO sys_export_field (config_id, field_name, field_label, field_type, field_width, field_format, dict_type, mask_type, mask_pattern, mask_replacement, converter_bean, default_value, sort, status, remark, create_time) VALUES
(#{item.configId}, #{item.fieldName}, #{item.fieldLabel}, #{item.fieldType}, #{item.fieldWidth}, #{item.fieldFormat}, #{item.dictType}, #{item.maskType}, #{item.maskPattern}, #{item.maskReplacement}, #{item.converterBean}, #{item.defaultValue}, #{item.sort}, #{item.status}, #{item.remark}, NOW())
